description: OMOTON:OMOTONoffers consumer accessory solution for your mobile Internet devices, such as Tablet cases, Keyboards, Power adapters, Batteries etc.We are passionate about excellence, so for every OMOTON purchasing, you can expect to get qualified products with really good price and amazing after service!This case is designed with Ultra Slim Case for your Kindle Paperwhite (Both 2012 and 2013 versions) with 6'' display and built-in light, will NOT fit Kindle or Kindle Touch or any other devices.Buy with confidence:1. The Thinnest and Lightest Case Cover for Kindle Paperwhite, Adding NO extra weight to your paperwhite while provide you perfect protection.2. Automatically wakes or puts your device to sleep when the cover is opened or closed, Easier for you to prolong the using time of battery.3. Antiskid PU Leather exterior, No-scratch microfiber interior, This will be your best paperwhite partner!4. Full access to all features without removing the case from your kindle paperwhite.5. OMOTON provide you life time warrany!OMOTON, Better than you want!
title: OMOTON Amazon Kindle Paperwhite Case Cover -- The Thinnest and Lightest PU leather Case Cover for Kindle Paperwhite (Both 2012 and 2013 versions with 6" Display and Built-in Light), Black
